text: A bat fell to the ground and was captured by a bitch. Near death, he begged the bat for his life. The bitch told him he couldn't let go because he was born an enemy of birds. The bat replied that it was not a bird but a mouse, fighting with this cunning. Some time later he fell again into the clutches of another bitch, and begged her not to eat him. I'm gonna take this bitch who hated all mice. The bat told him he wasn't a mouse but a bird. And he got away with it for the second time. If we adapt to the circumstances, we can survive.
title: Los murciélagos y las comadrejas
author: nan Esopo
